title: Developing Instructional Design Competencies to Strengthen 21st-Century Teacher Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in teaching elementary mathematics
context.additional_context: A competency enhancement program for corporate elementary mathematics education instructors.

learning_goals: Enhances the ability to design mathematics lessons reflecting 21st-century core competencies (critical thinking, creativity, collaboration, etc.)
Produces educational materials using mobile-optimized instructional design tools (surveys, digital worksheets, etc.)
Can explain methods for developing and applying digital rubrics for personalized learner assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
